definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Cytokines are small, soluble proteins with pleiotropic effects on a variety of cell types.
sentences.chinese: 细胞因子是具有多种生物活性的可溶性小分子蛋白质。

sentences.english: Interphase is divisible into various stages each characterized by a differing physiological activity.
sentences.chinese: 根据细胞生理活性差异可以把间期分成不同的阶段。

sentences.english: The solubility increase is not obvious with nonionic surfactants added.
sentences.chinese: 它与非离子表面活性剂复配增溶效果不明显。

sentences.english: This article introduces dyeing of polyamide-66 with brilliant fast reactive dyes.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了锦纶66用艳丽牢活性染料染色的方法。

sentences.english: The research aimed to study the preparation of activated carbon with Macadamia shell.
sentences.chinese: 研究以废弃澳洲坚果壳为原料的活性炭制备。

sentences.english: As a result, the broth of Cordyceps militaris fermentation contained antimicrobial active substances.
sentences.chinese: 蛹虫草发酵液中具有抗菌活性物质。

sentences.english: The huge surface area of activated charcoal gives it countless bonding sites.
sentences.chinese: 活性炭巨大的表面积提供了大量的活性位点。

sentences.english: The huge surface area of activated charcoal gives it countless bonding sites.
sentences.chinese: 活性炭巨大的表面积提供了大量的活性位点。

sentences.english: Anti-Xa activity is an acceptable alternate method to monitor heparin therapy.
sentences.chinese: 抗X因子活性是可接受的检测肝素治疗的替代方法。

sentences.english: Online education gives students enough flexibility.
sentences.chinese: 网上教育使学生们获得了许多灵活性。

sentences.english: Governance should not be a set of static processes without any flexibility.
sentences.chinese: 治理不应该是一组没有任何灵活性的静态过程。

sentences.english: Compounds 3, 10 and 4 also had high activities.
sentences.chinese: 化合物3，4，10也表现出较高的抗真菌活性。

sentences.english: The content of sulfated group in polysaccharides functions importantly on their biological activities.
sentences.chinese: 硫酸基含量对多糖的生物活性起着至关重要的作用。

sentences.english: Playing the cymbals can get fingers trained to work independently and build strength.
sentences.chinese: 敲打铜钹可以训练手指灵活性和力量。

sentences.english: The research aimed to analyze the components and antibacterial activities of essential oils from Salvia plebeia R.
sentences.chinese: 分析荔枝草挥发油化学成分并对其抑菌活性进行研究。

sentences.english: This open architecture design provides extensive flexibility.
sentences.chinese: 这种开发式架构设计提供广泛的灵活性。
